subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The former N.H.L. All-Star goaltender Evgeni Nabokov has signed a four-year contract with SKA St. Petersburg of Russia’s Kontinental Hockey League.
snippet: The former N.H.L. All-Star goaltender Evgeni Nabokov has signed a four-year contract with SKA St. Petersburg of Russia’s Kontinental Hockey League.
